author: Jonathan Randles
title: Univisionâ€™s Gizmodo Media Seeks Court Shield From Peter Thiel-Funded Lawsuits
text:
Blog publisher Gizmodo Media Group wants to prevent billionaire investor Peter Thiel from potentially funding defamation lawsuits brought against the media company over articles published in 2016 on the websites Deadspin and Jezebel.
To that end, Gizmodo Media is asking a judge to broaden the scope of an agreement between Mr. Thiel, his firm Thiel Capital LLC, and an adviser liquidating Gawker Media LLC for the benefit of Gizmodo and its employees, according to a filing Thursday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in New York.
...
